content: असमंजस {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Indistinct, unintelligible; स्खलदसमंजसमुग्धजल्पितं ते <ls>U. 4. 4</ls>; <ls>Māl. 10. 2</ls> faltering, inarticulate and pretty prattle. {@--2@} Unbecoming, improper; यद्यपि न कापि हानिर्द्राक्षामन्यस्य रासभे चरति . असमंजसमिति मत्वा तथापि तरलायते चेतः .. <ls>Udb.</ls> {@--3@} Absurd, nonsensical, foolish. --सं Non-conformity, disparity, difference. {%--<ab>ind.</ab>%} {@--1@} Unbecomingly, improperly. {@--2@} In a fluctuating or confused manner.
